original_text: When I spoke to you and when I taught you God's message, I did not use clever words. I did not want you to believe me because you thought I was wise. Instead, it was the power of God's Holy Spirit that showed you that my message was true.
korean_text: 내 말과 내 전도함이 설득력 있는 지혜의 말로 하지 아니하고 다만 성령의 나타나심과 능력으로 하여

sentences.original_text: and when I taught you God's message
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내가 너희에게 하나님의 메시지를 가르쳤을 때

sentences.original_text: I did not use clever words
I did not want you to believe me
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희가 나를 믿게 하고 싶지 않았다

sentences.original_text: because you thought I was wise
it was the power of God's Holy Spirit
